mdRecord.dcterms:title: Montfaucon
1:50.000e Montfaucon
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers. Regiment, 29th.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed at Base Printing Plant, 29th. Engineers, U.S. Army
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 70 x 51 cm. on sheet 76 x 54 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
The title, which appears in the upper margin, is preceded by the scale. In this copy, the map is torn so that "50,000e Montfaucon" is all that is visible. Assumed to have been "1:50,000e Montfaucon".
In upper left margin: Groupe des canevas de tir.

Detailed topographical map of environs of Montfaucon, France, extending from Clermont east to Dugny in the south, and north to RÃ©monville and Lissey. Shows the Meuse River from Dugny, through Verdun and north to Dun.
